img.title: Together as one community, we Learn. Lead. Succeed.
We commit to excellence with every learner, every day, every way.
We equip & engage every learner.
We optimize partnerships and align resources.
We grow academic achievement & educational opportunity.
Together, we are on the rise!
We embrace innovative learning.

div.span: Introducing your "one-stop-shop" to find the information you need in a clear and easy to navigate format concerning our extended closure: The WolfPack Hub!

div.a: Video Series: West Clermont Strategic Plan
div.span: During the week of February 24th-29th, West Clermont School District launched a series of 6 videos that introduced their strategic plan to the world.
The preschool enrollment lottery is now closed. If you are interested in being placed on a waitlist for the 2020-2021 school year, please complete the Preschool Enrollment Wait List Form.

div.a: 2020-21 Building-to-Building Transfer and Open Enrollment Requests
div.span: Building-to-building (intradistrict) transfer applications will be available on the district website from April 1st-May 15th. Open Enrollment (interdistrict) applications will be available on the district website from May 1st-June 15th.

The WCSD integrated preschool program is a high-quality pre-kindergarten program that provides an engaging and developmentally appropriate environment and learning experiences for students to prepare them for kindergarten.

div.a: District Adopts New Strategic Plan to Guide Future Growth and Achievement
div.span: During the September meeting, the West Clermont School District Board of Education formally adopted a bold new strategic plan to connect the districtâs current progress with rigorous priorities for student growth. The strategic plan will guide the district with new mission, vision and values statements and four strategic themes broken down ...

Do you want to get the latest news on all of the great things happening in the West Clermont School District? We want to connect with you! Sign up today to receive our #WCconnects Parent/Community Newsletter. Visit http://bit.ly/CommRegistration to sign up today!

West Clermont Words is a blog by West Clermont School District Superintendent Natasha Adams. On this blog, Superintendent Adams will discuss a variety of timely issues and provide information that will be helpful to West Clermont students, staff, parents, business partners and community members. It's entitled West Clermont Words because words ...
